<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/626</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/626</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Esperança de vida</string>
            <string language="en">Life expectancy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lebenserwartung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Espérance de vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expectativa de vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Speranza di vita</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υπολογιζόμενη διάρκεια ζωής</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta (PAR) que conté la definició del concepte esperança de vida i explica la importància d'aquesta dada per conèixer el nivell econòmic d'un territori. Conté un enllaç a IDESCAT per obtenir-ne dades.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer (PAR) on the definition of life expectancy and its importance in rating the economic development of a region. It includes a link to IDESCAT (the Catalan statistics agency) for data.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">població</string>
            <string language="en">population</string>
            <string language="es">población</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie (GLEICHHEIT) auf der
Definition der Lebenserwartung und seines Wertes, wenn Sie die 
ökonomische Entwicklung einer Region bewerten. Sie schließt 
ein Link zu IDESCAT (die katalanische Statistikagentur) für Daten 
ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez (PAIR) sur la définition
de l'espérance de vie et de son importance en évaluant le 
développement économique d'une région. Elle inclut un lien à
IDESCAT (l'agence catalanne de statistiques) pour des données.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda (PAR) na definição da 
expectativa de vida e da sua importância em avaliar o desenvolvimento
econômico de uma região. Inclui uma ligação a IDESCAT (a 
agência catalan dos statistics) para dados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a (PAR) sulla definizione di 
speranza di vita e della relativa importanza nella valutazione dello 
sviluppo economico di una regione. Include un collegamento a 
IDESCAT (l'agenzia catalan di statistiche) per i dati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις (ΙΣΟΤΙΜΙΑ) στον καθορισμό της 
υπολογιζόμενης διάρκειας ζωής και σπουδαιότητάς του στην 
εκτίμηση της οικονομικής ανάπτυξης μιας περιοχής. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια σύνδεση με IDESCAT (η καταλανική 
αντιπροσωπεία στατιστικών) για τα στοιχεία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bevölkerung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">population</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">população</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">popolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πληθυσμός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
